Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:尝

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+5C1D

Main pronunciation 主要发音: cháng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to taste.

English senses 英语理解: taste; try the flavour of

Usage example 用法举例: 品嘗 pǐn cháng (savor)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 99999

Shuowen 说文解字: 口味之也從旨尚聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 嘗 variant 甞 from mouth-taste-purpose 旨 zhǐ and phonetic many-still (尚)尙 shàng or sweet-mouth 甘 gān C060 嘗<嚐甞> B013 尝[嘗] simp 尝. (name- mouth-taste (尝)嘗 cháng)

甞字的基本解释

甞
cháng
古同“尝”。

甞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháng］
［《廣韻》市羊切，平陽，禪。］
亦作“嚐1”。亦作“甞1”。“尝1”的繁体字。
(1)辨别滋味，吃一点儿试试。
(2)食；吃。
(3)试探；试验。
(4)经历，身受，尝受。
(5)通“常”。
(6)古代秋祭名。
(7)泛指祭祀。参见“嘗駒”、“嘗醪”。
(8)副词。曾经。

甞字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【甘字部】　甞； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页754第16
【集韻】同嘗。詳口部嘗字註。

甞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
甞字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Ruin
cháng
Gu Tong "taste".
Ruin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cháng］
["Guangyun" City Sheep Cut, Pingyang, Zen. ]
Also called "Taste 1". Also known as "甞1". "Taste 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Identify the taste and try a little bit.
(2) Eat; eat.
(3) Probing; testing.
(4) Experience, experience, taste.
(5) "Always".
(6) The name of the ancient autumn festival.
(7) Refers to sacrifices in general. See "tasting ju", "tasting mash".
(8) Adverbs. once.
